BlackNightmare:

"I'm BlackNightmare,I'm leader of small group of
BlackFortress Femmes and I obey to Darkfate, Master of
BlackFortress;  yours?" said kindly the femme while
she sat down in a console and invited Blaze to do the
same "This Fortress is so big that you can lost here
and nobody notice it..." said Blacknightmare"I'm not
wonder that I haven't seen tou before, due that our
leader command us to up date our datas..."


--- CYBERWOLF4 <cyberwolf4@...> wrote:
> 
> Blaze follows Blacknightmare from a safe distance as
> much out of distrust as
> respect,  She had wanted answers and right now the
> bot she was with was her
> best chance to find them.
> The tigress wasn't sure if she fit in but memory
> loss tended to make bots a
> little paranoid. "Can I ask you your name?" she
> hesitated to ask remembering
> the old saying about curiosity and the cat.
> 
> They entered the registration room, the consoles
> seemed the same as all the
> others she'd seen on the ship. Blaze stepped closer
> to the console looking
> at the controls. Being a yechnologies specialist
> meant she could figure out
> almost any technology. She stood aside for
> Blacknightmare. the young female
> bott didn't want to show off in front of the
> Predacon so she stood to the
> side of the console to allow Blacknightmare room to
> access whatever she
> needed.
> ::
> 
> "Well " said kindly the femme "We can find out
> that... Follow me"
> 
> While she walked to other register room "If you're
> in this base then,
> you belong here" said Blacknightmare "We should
> check data bases and
> regist you, I guess that you don't know who's the
> leader here?"
> 
> 
> 
>
